= APERTURE manual =

This manual gives overviews of the different components of the toolbox. [DataStructures] gives information about the data structures used throughout the toolbox. [BatchProcessing] gives information about processing multiple subjects in serial or in parallel. [Importing] discusses methods of importing data. [Statistics] gives information about running mass-univariate and multivariate statistics. [Plotting] documents creation of individual figures and reports with many figures.
